jp_text: ありがとう

en_text: It wasn't your fault,\NMiss Utena.
jp_text: 引き止めて悪かった

en_text: Aren't you going with her?
jp_text: お前は一緒に行かないの？

en_text: Come here, Anthy.
jp_text: おいで アンシー

en_text: It's been a week.\NDid you miss me?
jp_text: １週間 寂しかったかい？
google_translated: Did you lonely for a week?

en_text: Yes, Big Brother.
jp_text: （アンシー）はい お兄様

en_text: Mickey has a sister\Nnamed Kozue Kaoru.
jp_text:
（ウテナ）
ミッキーの妹 薫梢(こずえ)ちゃん

en_text: Wow, she looks exactly like him.\NThey really are twins!
jp_text:
へえ そっくり！
ほんとに双子なんだ

en_text: I'm an only child,\Nso I'm kinda jealous.
jp_text:
僕は一人っ子だから
うらやましいよ
google_translated:
Because I am one child
I'm so jealous

en_text: Yes, it is nice to\Nhave a big brother.
jp_text: いいな 兄妹がいるって
google_translated: There is a good brother and sister

en_text: But I'm worried about these\NDuelists with the black roses.
jp_text:
（ウテナ）でも黒薔薇を持つ
デュエリストのことが気になるよ
google_translated:
also has black roses
I'm worried about duelist

en_text: Someone seems to be\Nmanipulating their hearts.
jp_text:
（アンシー）誰かが
心を操ってるみたいですね
google_translated:
Someone
It seems to be manipulating the mind

en_text: Kozue! What are you\Ndoing in that outfit?!
jp_text:
（ウテナ）梢ちゃん！
どうしたんだ？ その姿は

en_text: They got you, too?!
jp_text: まさか 君も…

en_text: Next time,\Non Revolutionary Girl Utena:
jp_text: 次回「少女革命ウテナ」…
